Shadrach, Meshach, and ABeanTogo

i have been working with my uncle and his coffee shops for almost 10 years in various positions. web developer, delivery driver, photographer, altho taste tester was the early favorite.

after finishing up their website redesign earlier this year i was delighted to be able to start working with them for some marketing images for instagram and the other social medias. it's not always the easiest working with family, but i'm so happy we have been able to make it work for so long. check their website out, go in, maybe buy a cuppa joe!

these images are from our most recent session for the month of august. I'll be updating as I go, so come back from time to time.

shot on canon 5D mkiii
